column1: Below is a list of supplies your child (ren) will need to actively participate in our
program. Please LABEL ALL of your child (ren) items.
• 8 marble note books(Iabel each Math, Science, Social Studies, Language
Arts, Foreign Language, Music, Joumal & Home Work)
• I I2inch ruler with both inches and centimeters
• I container (to hold all of the supplies)
